translations: 尤克里里琴（夏威夷的四弦琴，等于 ukelele）

sentences.sentence: I hear my teacher call me from the house, "Come and get your ukulele."
sentences.translation: 我听到老师在屋里叫我：“过来拿你的四弦琴。”

sentences.sentence: Your massage therapist knows that your back muscles are tighter than the strings on a ukulele; your shrink knows that half your tension comes from stress.
sentences.translation: 你的按摩师知道你的背部肌肉比女高音尤克里里琴弦还紧；你的心理医生会说你的紧张有一半来自于压力。
